headline.main: ADDITIONAL FROM CHILI.; Politics upon the River Plate Prospects of War with Brazil Statistics Gas In Valparaiso Commercial Shipping Miscellaneous.Correspondence of the New-York Times.

docs.snippet: In the Board of Aldermen, last evening, a resolution was adopted directing the Street Commissioner to return the award of contract for a steam fire engine, for the use of Engine Company No. 29, to the Common Council for confirmation forthwith.

headline.main: CITY GOVERNMENT.; THE BOARD OF ALDERMEN. GREATER PUBLICITY AND ECONOMY IN ADVERTISING CITY BUSINESS THE NOMINATION OF MR. WILLET FOR PRESIDENT OF THE CROTON BOARD REJECTED.

docs.lead_paragraph: In the Board of Aldermen, last evening, a resolution was adopted directing the Street Commissioner to return the award of contract for a steam fire engine, for the use of Engine Company No. 29, to the Common Council for confirmation forthwith.

headline.main: MARYLAND AFFAIRS.; Closing Scenes of the Legislature Railroad Bills Baltimore Delegation Turned Out Election Frauds Judge Stump An Affair of Honor Settled State Comptroller Deposed Appropriation Bill Passed Embittered Feeling Difficulties Regarding the Treasury Payments, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: I have been in this ancient capital since Monday last. It has been quite a stormy and excited week. The legislative session closes to night at 12 o'clock, when, by the Constitution, an adjournment must take place sine die. Never before in the history of our State has there been so strong an outside pressure.
